name: gas-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for Google Apps Script projects.

scripts.install: npm i @google/clasp @types/google-apps-script eslint-plugin-prettier && npm i -D nodemon eslint eslint-config-airbnb-base eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-import prettier prettier-eslint
scripts.dev: node config/switchEnv dev && npx clasp push -w
scripts.prod: node config/switchEnv prod && npx clasp push

author: Ben Ronkin
